name: Contemporary Minimalist Rustic Wood and Steel Bench by Scott Gordon

specifications.rawSpecificationsHTML: The Duncan Bench, an original design offered exclusively by Vermontica, is a contemporary Minimalist bench designed and produced in Vermont by Scott Gordon. A popular piece for any Vermont mudroom, the Duncan bench is comprised of a wood seat supported by steel legs. Shown here with a live edge antique hemlock plank, dimensions 3" thick, 18" wide, and 72" long. The bench seat could be made with a variety of wood species and dimensions. These are custom-made pieces, please let us know what wood species, dimensions, and finishes you require. Exact dimensions and look will vary from board to board.
